source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

spells.description:
Use: Inject a medicinal frostfire formula into your veins, instantly healing you for up to 4.6 million from a jolt of frost. To prevent sudden hypothermia, you will then burn for 30% of the amount healed.

Shares a cooldown with healing potions. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crown of Bloody Succession

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Frost Strike and Glacial Advance by 4% stacking up to 6 times. Frost Strike and Glacial Advance have a 7% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Winning Streak! causes Frost Strike and Glacial Advance to have a 8% chance to cast Frostscythe per stack at 30% effectiveness. Losing Winning Streak! sends you into a Murderous Frenzy, casting Frostscythe at 100% effectiveness and gaining 12% Mastery for 6 sec. Additionally, Frostscythe deals 40% more damage to the first target struck.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Harmonium Spaulders
Harmonium Spaulders

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Greaves of the First Eidolon

sockets.display_string: Hop onto a plank of wood with a haphazard shadowflame rocket attachment. Absolutely nothing could go wrong, but if it did, deal 526,286 Shadowflame damage split between you and enemies caught in the theoretical blast.

Transmogrified to:
Fine White Evening Gloves

spells.description: Use: Push the Big Red Button, launching a missile barrage which deals 2.7 million Fire damage split among all enemies in the area. Deals increased damage when striking multiple targets. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
